snippet: Host Finland, the defending champion, regained the top spot in its group at the world championships in Helsinki with a 5-2 win over Switzerland.
abstract: Finland defeats Switzerland, 5-2, to regain the top spot in its group at the world ice hockey championships.
lead_paragraph: Host Finland, the defending champion, regained the top spot in its group at the world championships in Helsinki with a 5-2 win over Switzerland.

headline.main: Finland Regains Top Spot in World Hockey Championships
